General.Name: UniTTEC Co Ltd
General.Description: UniTTEC Co.,Ltd provides integrated solutions in the areas of rail transit, and energy saving and environmental protection in China. The company offers generic CBTC Systems, interoperable CBTC systems, unattended train operation systems, train autonomous circumambulation system (TACS), and BiLOCKSTAR EWS fully electronic interlocking systems. It also provides automatic fare collection systems (AFC) and AFC system equipment; and multi-line center (MLC) of shared AFC systems. In addition, the company offers intelligent driving assistance systems, intelligent train monitoring and precaution systems, passenger information systems, on-the-way management system of cargo information, and high-speed vehicle-ground dump systems; system integration; and integrated operation and maintenance systems, smart work platforms, and security system integration products. Further, it provides vital computer, space and time big data, industrial internet, and vital general carborne platforms; and technical support services. Additionally, the company offers semiconductors, semiconductor equipment, integrated circuits, chips, and related products. The company was formerly known as United Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to UniTTEC Co.,Ltd in March 2017. UniTTEC Co.,Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
